mapper.select: SELECT (select count(1) from t_country) country, (select count(1) from t_league) league, (select count(1) from t_season) season, (select count(1) from t_team) team, (select count(1) from t_season_team) season_team, (select count(1) from t_match) matchCount, (select count(1) from t_odds_info) odds_info, (select count(1) from t_ThreadGroup4Games) ThreadGroup4Games, (select count(1) from t_ThreadGroup4SeasonAndTeam) ThreadGroup4SeasonAndTeam, ( select count(1) from t_match where score_result='end' ) matchEnd, ( select count(1) from t_match where score_result!='end' ) matchUnEnd

select t1.* from t_match t1 left JOIN ( select max(id) id,t1.league_id,t1.leagueName, max(t1.seasonName) seasonName from t_season t1 group by t1.leagueName ) t2 on t1.season_id=t2.id where 1=1 and ( (t1.home_team=#{key1} or t1.away_team=#{key1})
and (t1.home_team=#{key2} or t1.away_team=#{key2})
)
and t1.seasonName not like '%杯%'
and t1.seasonName like '%杯%'
order by t1.seasonName desc,boxName asc, groupName asc,(t1.roundName+0) desc limit 0,15
select * from t_odds_info where match_id=#{matchId} order by id asc
